product_name: Royal Robbins Horizon Solid V-Neck Sweater - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Durable, low-maintenance fabric means you can toss the Royal Robbins Horizon Solid V-neck sweater in your gear bag, day pack or carry-on so it's ready for you when you need a little extra warmth. Fabric blend of cotton, nylon and angora is naturally insulating and breathable. Royal Robbins Horizon Solid V-neck sweater features a contemporary fit that skims the body without being tight. Closeout.
short_description: Durable, low-maintenance fabric means you can toss the Royal Robbins Horizon Solid V-neck sweater in your gear bag, day pack or carry-on so it's ready for you when you need a little extra warmth.
